text: Hamile ‘‘musa’’ (alaihis'salama) ki amala'i sanketa garyaum ki usala'i dudha khuva'umdai gara ani yadi timila'i usako visayama kunai bhaya huncha bhane usala'i nadima halidinu ra timile kunai bhaya namannu na ta cinta garnu. Hamile usala'i timro pasama pharka'idinechaum ra usala'i paiaigambara bana'unevala chaum
